title: @Riot Kateykhaos How is Shen looking?
body: I know you aren't supposed to give any info on upcoming skins, but how is Shen looking in terms of a new skin. Are you guys exploring concepts for our favorite ninja or is he even on the list for new skin.

replies.body: I know you're not supposed to give any info on upcoming skins, but give me some info on upcoming skins.

I think you answered your own question; I'm not able to say one way or the other. ;-;
